text: Félix Pineda Flores (born in El Salvador) is a retired Salvadoran footballer. ==Club career== Nicknamed La Garrobita, Pineda played for Águila in the Barraza's Kinder Era in the middle of the 1970s.EL KINDER DE BARRAZA - Águila Online ==International career== Pineda played for the El Salvador national football team, appearing in 3 qualifying matches for the 1978 FIFA World Cup and 1 for the 1974 FIFA World Cup ==References== ==External links== * “La camisola de Águila pesa” - Aguilucho Mayor Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Association football forwards Category:Salvadoran footballers Category:El Salvador international footballers Category:C.D. Águila footballers
title: Félix Pineda
